Aggregation commands (and a Geospatial command)

Ref to Mongo command documentation for better understanding of each API and its return value is BsonDocument. Geospatial command can be found here.

All APIs are async.

Imports

../core/bson, ../core/types, ../core/wire, ../core/utils, ../core/multisock, diagnostic

Procs

                readConcern = bsonNull(); collation = bsonNull(); explain = ""): Future[
    BsonDocument] {....raises: [Exception, ValueError],
                    tags: [RootEffect, TimeEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect].}
